extension.name: CDN Tax Receipts (ML fork)
extension.description: Creates Tax Receipts including single or annual/aggregate tax receipts, with distribution by email or print, detailed reporting, press ready PDF template possible. We worked with (and continue to work with) a BDO Tax Partner who has strong ties to both the NPO community and Tax Authorities (CRA).
extension.comments: Fork by ML, which merges some elements from the original upstream and also bits from the CanadaHelps fork.
